attributes.action: Remove from Office The Archbishop of Canterbury
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Due to his failure to stand up for our Christian Faith,Heritage and Principles in our country .We are outraged that Dr Williams is advocating that Sharia Law be introduced as an alternative form of justice for Muslims totally ignoring the established laws of this country.

For his failure to stand up for The Christian Faith and instead advocating Islamic principles to be introduced into our laws he has shown himself not to be fit to hold the position of Archbishop of Canterbury and we demand his resignation.

reasons: Potentially libellous, false, or defamatory statements
Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
